messages.title: Tackling Climate Change
messages.content: The climate emergency and mass extinction are the greatest threat to our future. Like many of us I cycle and use public transport, after selling my car. I use renewable electricity. But we must all do more: as individuals and in our businesses and communities. As a country we must radically reform energy, transport and agriculture to move rapidly to carbon neutrality. And we must reform the regulation of the City. Currently it funds 15% of the world's carbon - we must ensure pensions and investments fund solutions instead. To succeed, we need to cooperate - globally and in the EU.

messages.title: Keeping our communities safe
messages.content: The plague of knife crime is wasting young lives and spreading fear across our communities. Glasgow and cities around the world have shown: sustained action across public services can succeed. We need schools to ensure every child thrives, more community police and to invest in our youth clubs and services.

messages.title: Matthew Kirk is leading the fight to STOP BREXIT
messages.content: Like the vast majority of people in Holborn and St. Pancras, I passionately believe that for our future peace and prosperity and to save the United Kingdom we must STOP BREXIT. The Liberal Democrats will always campaign to Remain at the heart of the European Union - as we have since the Referendum. The Liberal Democrats will stop Brexit by winning a People's Vote to remove the barriers stopping Brexit. Jo Swinson's deal will trash our environment and our rights. It will make us poorer and divide our country. And Corbyn's Labour has nothing to offer but dither and delay. Holborn and St Pancras needs a Remain MP in a Remain party. Holborn and St Pancras you have a choice. It is great or it is horrible. Vote for me to Stop Brexit, tackle the climate emergency and invest in our vital public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Radically reform energy, transport, and agriculture to move to carbon neutrality; reform regulation of the City and cooperate globally to address climate emergency.
Invest in public services to tackle knife crime, enhance community policing, and support youth services.
Campaign for a People's Vote to remain in the EU, remove barriers caused by Brexit, and ensure prosperity and peace for the future.

mentions.candidate: Liberal Democrat candidate for Holborn & St Pancras, Matthew Kirk says: "We need to stop the fear that people have on our streets over knife crime."
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party: Push for a Leave deal then sit on the fence in a People’s Vote. Chaotic, divided and weak. Losing support across our diverse neighbourhoods.
mentions.partyLeader: Jo Swinson’s Liberal Democrats: Stop Brexit. Strong and united. Winning for our communities in Holborn & St Pancras. Fighting for extra police and better funding for our NHS. Jo Swinson's deal will trash our environment and our rights.
